text: Technical Report extract: On 17/08/2025, preventive maintenance was carried out on DMRC train set TR-301 at Shastri Park Depot by team lead EMP-0427. The bogie suspension bushings were inspected per IRS R-16 and measured wear was 0.8 mm (limit 1.5 mm). TCMS event log showed no active faults; however, HVAC filter ΔP was 210 Pa, triggering a caution. A requisition for spares (Indent No. ENG/RS/IND-1189) worth ₹1,42,600 was raised to M/s Bharat Dynamics Components, with delivery scheduled by 28/08/2025. Lubricant grade per Spec DMRC-RS-LUB-07 was applied and torque values for yaw damper bolts were verified at 320 N·m.
label: Engineering

text: DMRC Electrical Systems Incident Report IR-EL-25/11/044 – Station: Rajiv Chowk (RCK). On 25/11/2025 at 09:12 hrs, LV panel LP-2 tripped due to overload; feeder F-2A peak at 392 A exceeding set limit 350 A. Shops UPS switchover delayed by 6 seconds causing ticket counter outage. Immediate action: redistributed HVAC load to F-3B; reset protective relay (Micom P123). Root cause suspected chiller CH-2 soft starter fault; OEM Schneider called under AMC No. SCH-DMRC-2025-06. Estimated rectification cost ₹1,32,000. Reported by EMP-0956.
